name: Royal Schiphol Group
goal: Royal Schiphol Group is an airport company with an important socio-economic task. Airports in the group create value for society and for the economy. Royal Schiphol Group is the owner and operator of Amsterdam Airport Schiphol, Rotterdam The Hague Airport and Lelystad Airport, and holds a majority stake in Eindhoven Airport. Our airports ensure optimum links for the Netherlands with the rest of the world and contribute to prosperity and well-being â€“ in the Netherlands and beyond.
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Airport Charges Directive
- Slot Regulation
- Ground Handling
- Single European Sky
- Sustainability
- Brexit
